## FieldTextInput.doValueInvalid\_() method

Called by setValue if the text input is not valid. If the field is currently being edited it reverts value of the field to the previous value while allowing the display text to be handled by the htmlInput\_.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected doValueInvalid_(_invalidValue: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_invalidValue | any | The input value that was determined to be invalid. This is not used by the text input because its display value is stored on the htmlInput\_. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
